sentences.en: And in later life these same children manifest conservation, domineering, rigid and prejudiced attitudes.
sentences.cn: 而在日后的生活中,这些儿童就表现出保守的 、 跋扈的 、 强硬的和有偏见的态度.

sentences.en: Between these episodes, subacute abdominal pain is manifest and the horse may assume a sitting - dog position.
sentences.cn: 在这些间歇期, 可出现亚急性腹痛,马可呈犬坐姿势.

sentences.en: Did you inspect Staff Sergeant Grimm's manifest, sign for the weapons, and contact Indiana?
sentences.cn: 你有签收葛林上士所载运的武器并且随后联络印第安那 吗 ?

sentences.en: Fear was manifest on her face.
sentences.cn: 她脸上显露出惧怕的神情.

sentences.en: Fear was manifest on his face.
sentences.cn: 他脸上显露出恐惧的表情.

sentences.en: Guess whose name just popped up on an international passenger manifest?
sentences.cn: 猜猜我在国际旅客单上发现谁的名字了?

sentences.en: He doesn't manifest much interest in his his studies.
sentences.cn: 他表现出对学业没多大兴趣.

sentences.en: If they reappear, they manifest themselves in certain typical ways.
sentences.cn: 一旦它们重复出现就会以特有的方法表现出来.

sentences.en: Surely because progress of a particular kind is actually taking place around us and is becoming more and more manifest.
sentences.cn: 无疑是因为某种特殊的进步确实地正在我们周围发生,而且正在变得越来越明显.

sentences.en: That is manifest to all of us.
sentences.cn: 那对我们大家来说是显而易见的.

sentences.en: The same alarm is manifest everywhere.
sentences.cn: 到处弥漫着同样的恐慌。

sentences.en: The shareholders have manifested their intention to sell the shares.
sentences.cn: 股东们表明了要出售股票的意图。

sentences.en: Their frustration and anger will manifest itself in crying and screaming.
sentences.cn: 他们用哭泣与尖叫表达自己的沮丧和愤怒。

sentences.en: There may be unrecog-nised cases of manifest injustice of which we are unaware.
sentences.cn: 也许还有一些我们不知道的明显不公平现象被忽视了。

sentences.en: There may be unrecognised cases of manifest injustice of which we are unaware.
sentences.cn: 也许还有一些我们不知道的明显不公平现象被忽视了。

trans.tran_en: a list of passengers or goods carried on a ship, plane, or train
to show a feeling, attitude etc
